name: Hytale
startup_command: java $( [ "$USE_AOT_CACHE" == "1" ] && printf %s "-XX:AOTCache=Server/HytaleServer.aot" ) -Xms128M -Xmx{{SERVER_MEMORY}}M -jar Server/HytaleServer.jar $( [ "$HYTALE_ALLOW_OP" == "1" ] && printf %s "--allow-op" ) $( [ "$HYTALE_ACCEPT_EARLY_PLUGINS" == "1" ] && printf %s "--accept-early-plugins" ) $( [ "$DISABLE_SENTRY" == "1" ] && printf %s "--disable-sentry" ) --auth-mode {{HYTALE_AUTH_MODE}} --assets Assets.zip --bind 0.0.0.0:{{SERVER_PORT}}
script_install:
#!/bin/ash
set -e
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

echo "[Atlas] Downloading Hytale Downloader..."
DOWNLOAD_URL="https://downloader.hytale.com/hytale-downloader.zip"

rm -f hytale-downloader.zip
curl -o hytale-downloader.zip $DOWNLOAD_URL
unzip -o hytale-downloader.zip -d hytale-downloader
mv hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux-amd64 hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux

# Permissions are required here for the downloader to run
chmod 555 hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux

echo "[Atlas] Verifying Downloader..."
./hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux -version
